recipes.title: Paneer Butter Masala
recipes.author: Chef Ritu
recipes.description: Cottage cheese cubes cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy with butter and spices.
steps: Saut√© onions and tomatoes with spices.
Blend into smooth paste.
Cook paste with butter and cream.
Add paneer cubes and simmer.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

recipes.title: Masala Dosa
recipes.author: Chef Lakshmi
recipes.description: Crispy rice and lentil crepe filled with spiced potato masala, served with chutney and sambar.
steps: Prepare potato masala stuffing.
Heat tawa and spread dosa batter thinly.
Add stuffing and fold dosa.
Serve with coconut chutney and sambar.

recipes.title: Palak Paneer
recipes.author: Chef Neha
recipes.description: Paneer cubes cooked in a smooth spinach gravy with Indian spices.
steps: Blanch spinach and blend to puree.
Prepare onion-tomato masala.
Add spinach puree and cook.
Add paneer cubes and simmer.
Serve hot with chapati or rice.

recipes.title: Vegetable Biryani
recipes.author: Chef Arjun
recipes.description: Aromatic basmati rice layered with spiced vegetables and saffron for a rich biryani.
steps: Cook rice with whole spices.
Prepare vegetable masala with yogurt.
Layer rice and masala in pot.
Top with saffron milk and ghee.
Dum cook and serve with raita.

recipes.title: Aloo Paratha
recipes.author: Chef Priya
recipes.description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced potato filling, cooked with ghee.
steps: Prepare wheat dough.
Mash potatoes and add spices.
Stuff filling inside dough balls.
Roll and cook on tawa with ghee.
Serve with curd and pickle.

recipes.title: Chole Bhature
recipes.author: Chef Anjali
recipes.description: Spicy chickpea curry served with deep-fried fluffy bread (bhature).
steps: Cook soaked chickpeas with spices and tomato-onion masala.
Knead flour with yogurt and rest dough.
Roll dough into bhature and deep fry.
Serve hot with chole, onion rings, and pickle.

recipes.title: Idli Sambar
recipes.author: Chef Kavya
recipes.description: Soft steamed rice cakes served with tangy lentil-based sambar and chutney.
steps: Steam idlis in idli stand.
Cook dal with vegetables, tamarind, and sambar powder.
Temper with curry leaves and mustard seeds.
Serve hot idlis with sambar and coconut chutney.

recipes.title: Rajma Chawal
recipes.author: Chef Rohit
recipes.description: Kidney beans cooked in rich onion-tomato gravy served with steamed rice.
steps: Pressure cook soaked rajma until soft.
Prepare onion-tomato masala with spices.
Add rajma and simmer for 15 minutes.
Cook rice separately.
Serve hot rajma with chawal.

recipes.title: Pav Bhaji
recipes.author: Chef Meera
recipes.description: Spicy mashed vegetable curry served with butter-toasted pav buns.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (potato, peas, carrot, capsicum)
steps: Boil vegetables and mash them.
Cook onion-tomato masala with pav bhaji masala.
Add mashed vegetables and simmer.
Toast pav buns with butter.
Serve bhaji with pav, onion, and lemon wedges.
